message: Mine are: 1) disrupt the board game industry with my actual startup; 2) work on something that will change/improve the society culture (like twitter has done); 3) work on something for the space internet
Create something that someone else's company or livelihood relies on.
Become recognized a an industry asset. I'm not in business to get rich.
Learn programming well enough to develop my own web app and get accepted somewhere like Y Combinator or Tech Stars to develop my app and gain exposure.
Continue to solve problems, develop inventions to make life easier, get the world away from oil and other fossil fuels with these inventions.  And of course get paid to do it. ;)
